name: Pan-Seared Salmon with Garlic Butter
instructions:
1. Heat a pan over medium-high heat.
2. Season the salmon fillets with salt and pepper.
3. Add olive oil to the pan and place the salmon fillets skin side down.
4. Cook for a few minutes until the skin is crispy.
5. Flip the salmon and add minced garlic and onions to the pan.
6. Sauté until the garlic is fragrant and the onions are soft.
7. Add a knob of butter and let it melt, basting the salmon.
8. Serve the salmon with the garlic and onion butter sauce on top.

name: Spicy Chicken Stir-Fry
instructions:
1. Heat a pan over medium-high heat.
2. Add chicken pieces and stir-fry until cooked through.
3. Remove the chicken from the pan.
4. In the same pan, add onions, garlic, and your choice of vegetables.
5. Stir-fry until the vegetables are tender.
6. Add the cooked chicken back to the pan.
7. Season with your favorite stir-fry sauce and spices.
8. Stir well and serve hot.

name: Garlic and Spinach Stuffed Mushrooms
instructions:
1. Remove stems from mushrooms and chop them finely.
2. In a skillet, sauté minced garlic and chopped mushroom stems in olive oil.
3. Add spinach and cook until wilted.
4. Fill mushroom caps with the garlic-spinach mixture.
5. Bake in the oven at 350°F (175°C) for 15-20 minutes.
6. Serve as appetizers.

name: Garlic and Herb Mashed Potatoes
instructions:
1. Boil peeled potatoes until tender.
2. In a separate pan, heat butter and sauté minced garlic and fresh herbs (e.g., rosemary, thyme).
3. Drain potatoes, mash them, and mix in the garlic-herb butter.
4. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Serve hot.

name: Garlic Roasted Brussels Sprouts
instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Trim and halve Brussels sprouts.
3. Toss them with minced garlic, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
4. Spread and roast them on a baking sheet. 
5. Serve hot.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions:
1. Brown ground beef in a pan.
2. Season with taco seasoning.
3. Serve in taco shells with toppings.

name: Quinoa Salad
instructions:
1. Cook quinoa and let it cool.
2. Mix with chopped vegetables and herbs.
3. Drizzle with vinaigrette dressing.
4. Toss and serve.

name: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
instructions:
1. Sauté shrimp in olive oil until pink.
2. Add garlic, lemon juice, and parsley.
3. Cook for another 2 minutes.
4. Serve hot.

name: Homemade Pizza
instructions:
1. Roll out pizza dough.
2. Spread tomato sauce and add toppings.
3. Bake in a preheated oven until crust is golden.
4. Slice and enjoy!

name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions:
1. Sauté mushrooms and onions in butter.
2. Add Arborio rice and cook until translucent.
3. Gradually add hot broth, stirring until absorbed.
4. Serve with Parmesan cheese.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions:
1. Brown ground beef in a pan.
2. Add onions, garlic, and tomatoes.
3. Simmer for 30 minutes.
4. Serve over cooked spaghetti.
